title: Opendoor stock is on fire; pops 65% after new CEO from Shopify and $40 Million boost - can Open Stock momentum really last?
description: Opendoor stock has surged over 65%, capturing investor attention after the company appointed Shopifys former COO, Kaz Nejatian, as its new CEO and welcomed co-founders Keith Rabois and Eric Wu back to the board. The leadership shakeup comes as Opendoor pushes forward with artificial intelligence to streamline home pricing and repairs, aiming to turn around its business and improve margins.
content:

title: Stephen King perfectly sums up why he isn't worried about being replaced by AI
description: Artificial intelligence is becoming increasingly integrated into our lives, with many people concerned that it is reducing our critical thinking skills and could even impact jobs in creative industries such as writing, filmmaking and art.
content:
Stephen King has revealed why he isn’t scared of artificial intelligence replacing him – but he issued a warning for future writers.
Artificial intelligence is becoming increasingly integrated into our lives, with many people concerned that it is red... [2005 chars]

title: Meta, OpenAI face FTC inquiry on chatbot impact on kids
description: The Federal Trade Commission ordered Alphabet Inc.'s Google, OpenAI Inc., Meta Platforms Inc. and four other makers of artificial intelligence chatbots to turn over information about the impacts of their technologies on kids.
content: (Bloomberg/Leah Nylen) — The Federal Trade Commission ordered Alphabet Inc.’s Google, OpenAI Inc., Meta Platforms Inc. and four other makers of artificial intelligence chatbots to turn over information about the impacts of their technologies on kids.... [2592 chars]

title: AI must not ignore human rights
description: WASHINGTON, D.C. — In July, Donald Trump’s administration held an event titled “Winning the AI Race,” where it unveiled its AI Action Plan. Like the billion-dollar data-center deals announced during the United States president’s trip to the Persian Gulf in May, the plan is meant to enhance American leadership in artificial intelligence (AI). But since neither the plan nor those earlier announcements mentioned human rights, it’s fair to question what it even means for the US to “win” the AI race.
content: WASHINGTON, D.C. — In July, Donald Trump’s administration held an event titled “Winning the AI Race,” where it unveiled its AI Action Plan. Like the billion-dollar data-center deals announced during the United States president’s trip to the Persian G... [6349 chars]

title: US stock market rally to new highs: Dow hits record, S&P 500 and Nasdaq reach all-time highs as Nvidia and Micron jump ahead of bigger-than-expected Fed rate cut after jobless claims rise
description: U.S. stocks are holding near record highs today as investors weigh rising inflation, AI-driven tech gains, and mixed economic signals. The S&P 500 and Nasdaq are leading the rally, boosted by strong performances from Nvidia, Micron, Apple, and Microsoft, which are benefiting from growing interest in artificial intelligence and cloud innovations. Meanwhile, consumer prices remain elevated, and subtle shifts in the labor market, including rising jobless claims, are adding caution for investors.
content:
